name: Rolling Dinos
description:
Rolling Dinos is a puzzle game with cute dinosaur pieces. The rules are quite simple, but it is very challenging.

The goal of this game

Just arrange the same colored dinos for each row. 

Rules

When you click    button , the four dinos around it rotate clockwise. 

Points

Each rotation of dinos consumes one MOVE point, and after MOVE point run out, Bonus pont decreases. If Bonus also runs out, the game is over.  Return the dinosaurs to their friends before the points run out.
